review: Startup instructions are easy to follow, even if you are not gadget savvy.  It took only minutes to install.Love it and have recommended it to several friends.
author: Lottie-Da

review: Easy to install and easy to use.  Pleased that everything came with it needed to install.  We are enjoying using it.
author: Al Dean

review: I would love to rate the Fire Stick higher however the problem I have is in what you can watch.  Unless you're watching one of Amazon Prime's produced shows, most everything else you have to pay for even after paying for Amazon Prime.  Say you want to watch an old Closer or Lost, you have to pay for each episode!  I guess it's time for me to a Netflix account.
author: V. Compton

review: There is only one thing I am dissapointed about Fire TV stick: The Fire Tv remote app is not available in Mexico ,my country. I hope you make it availble for everyone soon.
